ygData.subject: Re: whats the deal with the last name thing?BIG Deal !!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, yes it s true, u will get ya 2nd name when you reach lvl 20, u need to page a GM to do that.  I was there when Leshrec got his 2nd name, and I ve
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, yes it's true, u will get ya 2nd name when you reach lvl 20, u need
to page a GM to do that. I was there when Leshrec got his 2nd name, and
I've confimed with GM that it MUST be ONE word, but can be separated by a '
sign, eg Ziltus De'GuaiLan ;)

U may wanna use Nicademous De'SiaLan, hahahahahahah!


On Tuesday, 06 July, 1999 5:34 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
wrote:
> Last name r for Vain pll .
> eg Garren, Leshrec, Sereph, Ziltus, Trifrost. Einan, Kenven,
Yutaka.Aaleku..and ya.. Icefrost too if u r reading this BS.
>
> Yiyang
> feighing death
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
> To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>

> Subject: [sg-everquest] whats the deal with the last name thing?
>
>
> i was reading about some discussion boards n stuff... they were saying
that u get ya last name when u get level 20... anyone can verify that?
>
> Fred aka Nicademous
